phrases: I was being too selfish and could not realize how lost and confused you were.
I am not lost or confused.
I have no intention of splitting up with you.
Do not worry about me, and really think about it.
Right now, you really need to think about what is important to you and what you should do.
I will be all right.
No matter what choice you make, I will wait.
We cannot break away from each other so easily anymore.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Doushite umaku ikanai wa
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kono unmei bakari I love
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Atsui omoi wo uketomete
Doko made mo tsunagattetai
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 25 ...
Is not it still early to be looking at the exam prep books?
I wanted to see the questions they have asked in previous years.
J University... J University...
I am not sure if she has not decided yet, of if he still does not know what to do...
Here you go.
Thanks.
Since he has not given me an answer yet, it probably means he is thinking about it in his own way.
I heard their English exam's really hard, so I am kind of worried about how much I need to know...
Let us see.
Takahashi... if you actually get into J University, I will respect you for the rest of my life.
Do not you mean you will have the privilege of respecting me?
Christmas is doomsday...
Huh?
But is not Yano moving on the 24th?
And he still has not given you an answer?
Yeah.
It is almost December!
Will things really be all right?
But I am the one who told him it is okay to go...
And besides, even in the worst case scenario, we will only be apart for a year and I am prepared for that.
Yeah.
It is only a year.
And it is not definite that Yano's going to transfer schools.
Let us start with your weak point, those long reading passages.
Yeah.
Yano...
Yeah?
You did not have to apply to the College of H...
I am sorry.
I saw your questionnaire.
Trying to get into a public and national university at the same time...
You will not be able to keep up, and you will fail both exams-
Do not worry about it.
Just think about yourself, Takahashi.
Let us both do as much we can right now.
You do not have to worry about me.
You are not fair!
Yano, you are not fair!
What now?
He always... takes hold of me so tightly like this.
And it is so frustrating, but I am going to throw myself into those collage exams!
Bathroom break.
Okay.
Takahashi.
Do not slack off.
I-I am working on it.
Huh...?
I wonder how long a year apart from someone really is...
It is really gotten cold all of sudden, huh?
Really?
It seems the same as usual to me...
Maybe...
Yano, why is your hand always so warm?
Because my heart is always so warm... huh?
Note:
There is a common superstition that people with cold hands have warm hearts, and vice versa.
You have things backwards.
Then, why is your hand so cold, Takahashi?
Because I have a warm heart.
What is so funny?
Hey... let me take you somewhere nice.
The other day, I found something that looks exactly like you.
It is probably just another thing like this, is not it?
It is a puppy...
I thought its eyes were kind of like yours, well-separated and all.
It is so cute...
Should I catch it for you?
That is all right.
You will just waste your money.
I would get it on the first try.
How boring.
I promised...
I swore to myself...
But right now... the warmth of Yano's hand is beginning to lead me astray.
This is not like you.
Being all wishy-washy about the decision.
Though it is understandable.
It is a lose-lose situation always leading to regret.
But in that case, is not it the same whichever you pick?
Hey.
The more you tease Takahashi like this, the harder it is going to be on her.
It may seem cruel, but if you are going to go, just tell her.
She normally does not complain very much, you know?
And she acts appropriately to the time and place.
Because she knows that I only have a mom...
This whole thing is just weird to begin with.
Mom's not a little girl, but she is not really that mature either, even at forty-two.
You want me to say I cannot leave her alone?
It is just a year.
But she got married on her own, got divorced on her own, and decided on her new workplace all by herself.
Without caring one a bit about her son, who has entrance exams coming up.
That one year...
Why she could not have just waited one more year to get divorced?
It is not like your mom asked you to go with her...
Am I supposed to pretend like I did not feel my mom asking me to go...
This totally sucks.
I wonder if Takahashi's really that strong?
Are you sure you are not just giving her time...?
Are you sure you do not see her beginning to regret what she said, so you are purposely delaying your decision?
If Takahashi told me not to go...
I might not be able to go.
Takahashi.
A-Ah, yes?!
Want To stop by the library today?
Ah, umm...
I have a student council meeting today, so go on ahead.
It will take some time.
Oh.
Sorry.
I guess I should pick out a present soon.
I see.
Well, you would better talk to your mother about this.
Sensei... here is the day book.
Good work.
Day book
Umm, when is the closing ceremony?
December 24th, remember?
Just like every year.
T-That is right...
I have not received transfer papers from anyone yet.
Why am I so relieved...?
Was not I prepared for this?
But... a whole year is a long time.
It is a lot longer than I first thought...
It is a long time.
Huh?
It is strange of you to come over this late, Nana!
What is the matter?
Nothing much...
Come on in.
Want some hot chocolate?
I would love some.
I found a lot of potential presents for him today.
Let Me see, let me see!
Ah, this pendant!
It would really suit him!
Your really think so?
Do you really think it is good?
They actually come in pairs, with one for a girl, too.
I have never been interested in that couple look, but I thought this might be nice!
We can wear them every day, and we can think of each other when we are apart, right?
I-I am just giving an example.
Like when we are both at home or something.
That whole feeling being together all day is great, right?
Yeah...
Mizu-chin, I...
Nana...
I regret telling him that it is okay to go...
What am I going to do?
I did not understand a thing...
What it would mean for Yano to leave...
That I would not be able to see him...
I cannot imagine a world without him...
What it would mean for Yano to leave...
That I would not be able to see him...
I did not understand a thing.
I cannot imagine a world without him.
But even if I am finally realizing it, it is too late.
Wow...
Takeuchi-kun.
You are even studying here?
While waiting for Yano.
Whoa... mnemonics.
I am pretty good at them.
You are pretty amazing.
Have you been well?
Yeah.
Er, have a seat.
You sure?
In order to.
You got it!
I am still only in part two of the book, though.
You will see in no time.
W-What is it?
Are you in shock that the school I am trying to get into is a stretch for me?
Please do not think I am craz-
I take back what I said the other day.
I think it is perfect for you.
You take back what you said...?
Ah, Yano.
You are late.
I finished most of part two.
Ah, going to run to the girl's room.
We only went through some problems together.
I know.
After you leave, though, this is probably how our time together will be spent.
I take back what I said the other day.
I think it is perfect for you.
No, no.
Do not get distracted.
I wonder if there is still time left...
Yano
T-That surprised me.
Yoo-hoo!
Y-Y-Yoo-hoo.
What were you just doing?
I was thinking of something stupid.
I thought of something stupid.
Hey, look outside.
Hi!
Hey, what time do you think it is?
If my parents see me, I am toast!
Let us get to the park!
Where?
Shh!
You are too loud.
How did you get here?
By bus!
By bus?
That last one's already left.
Why did he suddenly come over so late...?
Did he... come up with his answer?
You are so mean.
And after I bought you coffee, too.
Sorry.
I am sorry, Takahashi.
He does not even know how I feel.
Takahashi.
If... I were...
If I were to become an adult, and I had nothing...
That is... a proposal, is not it?
Maybe.
That surprised me.
You made me lose the moment, moron.
How old is an adult?
Twenty?
I do not know.
When you can live on your own without your parents having to look after you?
I will be an adult soon.
I will be an adult soon, and I will be the one doing protecting, not the one being protected.
I will not let anyone have anything to complain about.
Nobody will be left with heart wrenching feelings.
Not my mother, not my family, not my woman.
This I swear.
I will definitely become someone who can protect them.
Yeah...
The lips of the one dearest to me were quivering softly in the moonlight.
I am sorry, Yano.
I am sorry.
Even if it was just for a second, I am embarrassed I made such a fuss over this.
It is as if this winter sky was meant to test the strength of my heart.
Are those feelings disrespectful of others?
I want to live only for him.
Last night?
Yeah.
I remember having a dream.
A dream?
We all had a blast at Take's... and after I got a little dozy, you appeared in my dream.
We had some problems, you got mad that you were wrong...
What a mysterious dream...
Yeah.
You were crying.
You said you regretted it.
You said you really did not understand anything.
What were you regretting?
I might still... make it in time.
I might still make it.
That was just a dream.
I do not regret anything.
Yano, you weirdo!
Taking your dreams so seriously.
Yano, people are watching!
He saw straight through me.
Our feelings are as clear as day.
We might regret this.
We might never know what would have been best.
We may not know whether we are following fate or fighting it...
Oh, look!
It is you, Nanami!
She is still in there.
Geez...
Nana-chaaan!
My heart...
G-Get it for me.
All right!
My wish is for Yano's dream to come true.
Yes... my wishes will become Yano's wishes...
That is how we will continue to support each other, right?
Let us leave what lies in our future to the future.
I could not get it...
You wasted all your money...
Nanami bought this for him.
I thought you were good at that game.
I just used up all of my energy.
Darn it.
Is something wrong?
No... today's just pretty chilly, so my heart feels tight.
It sure is snowing a lot this year.
Ah... see?
There goes my heart, clenching up again...
Clenching up... like it is carving this moment into itself...
Like the sound of us walking through the snow...
Like it is measuring my feelings for you...
Dinner tonight's that stew you love.
Mom, I would like to get my allowance early.
What are you going to spend it on?
I want to spend Christmas with my girlfriend.
You see...
This year's Christmas present is...
Tada!
A full day at the Asahigawa Zoological Park!
No way!
No way!
It is no Disneyland, but you can go?
No way...
For... Christmas?
Yeah!
I will definitely go!
Really?
Awesome!
We will be able... to spend it together.
Yano's going to stay behi-
Available Days
It is...
I could hear the beating of my heart.
I am sorry, Takahashi...
I am going...
Yeah.
I will be fine...
I will be fine.
I will not regret the regrettable.
I accepted that paradox...
I Am About To kimi ga iikaketa kotoba ga
Yubisaki ni sotto oritekita
Nanimo iwanakute ii yo
Tsumaida yubi wo gyutto atatamete
Kotoba wa kotoba dakara kokoro hanbun mo tsutaenai kara
Setsunakute modokashikute yuuyake futari wo tsutsundeiru
Komiageru mune no omoi kokoro ga itai yo
Moshi kimi ga tabibito ni nattara
Kore gurai kimi wo matteru darou
Kisetsu wa kawaru sono tabi ni
Kioku ga usuragu koto ga attemo
Dareka wo konna fuu ni kokoro ippai de aisenai kara
Mamaritai taisetsu na kimi
Itsu datte futari wa hitori ja nai
Kono mune ga kawaresou de
Furete hoshii yo
Setsunakute modokashikute kaerenai kono mama aruiteitai
Yabaisaki ni kanjiteiru kokoro no kotoba wo
The words you were just about to say
fell softly onto my fingertips.
You do not have to say anything.
I will clasp your hand tightly and warm it up.
Because words are words, I cannot express half of the feelings in my heart.
It is so wrenching and irritating as the sunset engulfs the two of us.
My heart aches from all the feelings welling up inside of me.
If you were to become a traveler,
would I be able to wait for you as I do now?
As the seasons change,
even if our memories are to fade.
I would not be able to love someone with all of my heart like this.
I want to protect the precious you.
The two of us are never alone.
Me heart feels so fragile
and I want you to touch it.
It is so wrenching and irritating that I cannot go home.
I want to keep walking like this.
I feel the words from your heart on my fingertips.
Final Episode Preview...
We were all indeed here.
We lived here...
I came to love him...
I loved her...
Receiving so many beginnings and countless feelings...
Learning each other's strengths and weaknesses...
We... were indeed here.
